TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IStateFormatter

summary.span: 定义要对对象图进行序列化和反序列化，类型应实现的方法。

span.span: Defines methods that a type implements to serialize and deserialize an object graph.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口定义了一个类型可以实现序列化和反序列化的 ASP.NET Web 服务器控件中维护状态的方法及其属性。The interface defines methods that a type can implement to serialize and deserialize the state that an ASP.NET Web server control maintains in its property. 此基础结构由派生的类类，以保持 ASP.NET 页面的请求之间的状态。This infrastructure is used by classes that derive from the class to maintain an ASP.NET page's state between requests. 默认情况下，序列化和反序列化的实例由 ASP.NET 页面状态类; 但是，站点和适配器开发人员可以实现上其自己的类型，若要执行这项工作的接口。By default, ASP.NET page state is serialized and deserialized by an instance of the class; however, site and adapter developers can implement the interface on their own types to perform this work. 有关 Web 服务器控件状态管理和视图状态的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))并[动态的 Web 服务器控件和 View State](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c1ea6a66-3307-4c98-8187-cad462e1c027)。For more information about Web server control state management and view state, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)) and [Dynamic Web Server Controls and View State](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c1ea6a66-3307-4c98-8187-cad462e1c027). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建Web 服务器将视图和控件状态保存到流的对象。The following code example demonstrates how to create a object that saves view and control state to a stream on the Web server. `StreamPageStatePersister`类演示如何重写和方法来提取和保存页状态信息。The `StreamPageStatePersister` class demonstrates how to override the and methods to extract and save page state information. 这些方法使用接口继承自类进行序列化和反序列化视图状态。These methods use the interface inherited from the class to serialize and deserialize view state. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_2/CS/textfilepagestatepersister.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_2/VB/textfilepagestatepersister.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object Deserialize(string serializedState) cil managed
Public Function Deserialize (serializedState As String) As Object

param.name: serializedState
param.span: 会将其反序列化为初始化对象的字符串。

span.span: A string that the deserializes into an initialized object.

summary.span: 从对象状态图的序列化字符串形式对其进行反序列化。

span.span: Deserializes an object state graph from its serialized string form.

returns.span: 表示 ASP.NET 服务器控件状态的对象。

span.span: An object that represents the state of an ASP.NET server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法来重建已序列化使用的 ASP.NET 页或服务器控件的状态对象方法。Use the method to reconstitute the state object for an ASP.NET page or server control that has been serialized using the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将方法加载视图状态信息。The following code example demonstrates how the method loads view state information. 方法`StreamPageStatePersister`类使用接口继承自类反序列化视图状态。The method of the `StreamPageStatePersister` class uses the interface inherited from the class to deserialize view state. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分接口。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the interface. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_2/CS/textfilepagestatepersister.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_2/VB/textfilepagestatepersister.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string Serialize(object state) cil managed
Public Function Serialize (state As Object) As String

param.name: state
param.span: 该对象表示要序列化为字符串形式的 Web 服务器控件的视图状态。

span.span: The object that represents the view state of the Web server control to serialize to string form.

summary.span: 将 ASP.NET Web 服务器控件状态序列化为字符串形式。

span.span: Serializes ASP.NET Web server control state to string form.

returns.span: 表示 Web 服务器控件的视图状态的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents a Web server control's view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法来转换为字符串形式的对象状态图。Use the method to transform an object state graph to string form. 重建从字符串中使用的状态对象方法。Reconstitute a state object from the string using the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将方法仍然存在的文件的视图状态信息。The following code example demonstrates how the method persists view state information to a file. 方法`StreamPageStatePersister`类使用接口继承自类来序列化视图状态。The method of the `StreamPageStatePersister` class uses the interface inherited from the class to serialize view state. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分接口。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the interface. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_2#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_2/CS/textfilepagestatepersister.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_2#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_2/VB/textfilepagestatepersister.vb#3)]
